author: divyagayathri-hcl
title: [Thinkit] Add packet index to L3 admit tests to debug packet drops, Increase error tolerance slightly to 4%, Wait till counter is is updated to required value, Skip test if control plane bandwidth is lesser than queue rate, Buffer config needs to be allocated equally to validate scheduler & Clearing tables during config setup is best effort.

title: [Thinkit] Add L3 Admit for watch port testDs, don't ignore fatal failures during switch reboot, Remove obsolete workaround & gNMI port interface tests.

Update control_device_reboot_test to reboot all control devices connected to the DUT.

author: VSuryaprasad-HCL
title: [Thinkit] Use a new test fixture for sflow reboot test. Collect ASIC_DB and CONFIG_DB in sFlow debug logs.Add an API to set sflow interface config. Verify the packets received at SUT when sending traffic from control switch. Change backoff test traffic speed to generate 850 samples/sec

title: [Thinkit] Test sFlow interface counter value during standalone test. Use `pins-sampling-sflow` namespace for `actual-ingress-sampling-rate`. do not fail test when `/etc/hsflowd.auto` is not present. Add a restart test.

author: VSuryaprasad-HCL
